name: Frost Operative
title: Filtered in Liquidation: Frost Operative
desc: Selected while still children, they can only become an "Operative" after many long years of training and teaching, after countless rounds have winnowed the field.

attributes.source: Reward for accepting the Tavern Challenge at The Cat's Tail and claiming victory in a Friendly Fracas with the Frost Operative

skills.name: Thorny Onslaught
skills.desc: Deals 4 Cryo DMG. Attaches Onslaught Stance to this character.

skills.name: Blood-Bonded Shadow
skills.desc: (Passive) After this character uses a Skill: Attach Bond of Life to the opponent's active character with Usage(s) equal to (this Skill's finalized DMG total -2). (Max 5 stacks)
